md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 08
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: Relive the Oleson’s adoption of Nancy, and every endearing moment of season eight of the series, with restored and remastered picture and sound.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: Relive the Oleson’s adoption of Nancy, and every endearing moment of season eight of the series, with restored and remastered picture and sound. Share memories with the Wilders and Ingalls when snowed in at Christmas, witness Almanzo’s stroke and the birth of baby Rose, and behold Charles’ faith as he pleads for his adopted son’s life, in this completely uncut and unforgettable, 22-episode saga.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: Relive the Oleson’s adoption of Nancy, and every endearing moment of season eight of the series, with restored and remastered picture and sound. Share memories with the Wilders and Ingalls when snowed in at Christmas, witness Almanzo’s stroke and the birth of baby Rose, and behold Charles’ faith as he pleads for his adopted son’s life, in this completely uncut and unforgettable, 22-episode saga.
